rukus.text: My daly Moses svyate pysannya - ne havanʹ budʹ-yakyy sumniv pro zbory Yo - ta my vstyhly dovidnyk dlya Ditey Izrayilya
My pryznachyly z chysla yim imams kotri kerovanyy u vidpovidnosti do nashykh zapovidey, tomu, shcho vony steadfastly persevered ta dosyahnuly certainty pro nashi vidkryttya
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto bude sudyty yikh na Dni Resurrection, vidnosno vse vony posperechalysya
tse kolysʹ traplyayetʹsya yim skilʹky heneratsiy my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim? Vony zaraz zhyvutʹ ta zakhodyatʹ yikhni domivky predkiv. Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty dostatni dokazy. Vony ne chuyutʹ
vony ne zdiysnyuyutʹ shcho my vedemo vodu do bezplidnykh zemelʹ, ta produktsiyi z tse zerno do zhyvlennya yikhnya domashna khudoba, tak zhe, yak i sebe? Vony ne dyvlyatʹsya
Vony vyklyk: "De shcho peremoha, yakshcho vy pravdyvi
Kazhutʹ, denʹ taka peremoha prybuvaye, viryachy ne bude vyhoda tsey khto ne vvazhav pered shcho, ne bude vony podanyy inshyy shans
Tomu, disregard yim ta chekayutʹ, vony nadto chekayutʹ
